bike.description: Schwinn N'Litened Gold Label double butted Aluminum with Black Label Carbon seat stay and Bio-Tuned Ergonomic geometry

components.description: Schwinn N'Litened Black Label Carbon with Cro-Mo steerer and forged dropouts
Xero Shawla 280 wheelset with aero double wall rim 28 hole front and 32 hole rear
Xero Shawla 280 28 hole front and 32 hole rear(F), Xero Shawla 280 28 hole front and 32 hole rear(R)
14 G stainless radial front and 3 cross / radial rear
Nylon body road with steel cage and toe clip & straps
Tektro R 538 alloy long reach caliper
Road Tuned 6000 series alloy ergonomic drop bar, 31.8
Road Tuned 1 1/8" threadless A-head for 31.8 bar
Road Tuned Black Label Carbon with forged alloy head, 27.2
